title: Crop Image
description: CropImage.app is a fast, easy, and privacy-focused online tool for cropping images into various shapes—circle, heart, geometric, and custom designs. It’s perfect for social media users, designers, and content creators. With no downloads required, local processing ensures your data stays private. Simply upload, crop, and download high-quality images instantly. Free to use with no ads, CropImage.app is your go-to tool for fast, professional image cropping.
